inclusion.criterion: no fever or skin infection signs in the 5 days prior to surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to antiseptic soap, chlorohexidine-alcohol or shellfish
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: shellfish, or patient who had any infection in the perioperative period
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has no specific past medical issues and only uses prenatal vitamins. She is a social alcohol consumer with negative history of smoking or drug use.
